text: I love such mirth as does not make friends ashamed to look upon one another next morning.
author: Izaak Walton

text: I am really passionate about my career and my music and I am so lucky to be able to do what I do for a job, so for all the early morning starts and long days, I could never trade it all in.
author: Rachel Stevens

text: London is completely unpredictable when it comes to weather. You'll start a scene, and it's a beautiful morning. You get there at 6 in the morning, set up, you start the scene, start shooting. Three hours later, it is pitch black and rainy.
author: David Schwimmer

text: I derive no pleasure from prosecuting a man, even though I know he's guilty do you think I could sleep at night or look at myself in the mirror in the morning if I hounded an innocent man?
author: Jim Garrison

text: I was the type of guy that used to get up in the morning and go out and just out run everybody on the field without stretching or warming up or anything.
author: Bo Jackson
